title: Sell Smoke Wagon Rare & Limited
metaTitle: Sell Smoke Wagon Rare & Limited Bourbon | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Smoke Wagon Rare & Limited, Desert Jewel, and Elevator Batch bottles. We buy rare Smoke Wagon releases. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy rare Smoke Wagon releases including Rare & Limited and Desert Jewel.
introParagraph: Smoke Wagon from Nevada H&C Distilling has gained a cult following for its high-rye MGP bourbon blends. We focus on purchasing the Rare & Limited releases, Desert Jewel, and other special batches. If you have a collectible Smoke Wagon bottle, get a direct offer from us today.
whatWeBuy: Smoke Wagon Private Barrel Select (older picks)
whatWeDoNotBuy: Smoke Wagon Uncut Unfiltered (recent batches, unless part of collection)
photoChecklist: Front label distinct tint color (for Rare & Limited)
pricingFactors: Batch rarity (Rare & Limited batches differ significantly in value)
Specific release (Desert Jewel vs Elevator Batch)

faqs.question: Which Smoke Wagon bottles are Rare & Limited?
faqs.answer: These are specific releases, often with distinct colored glass (purple, amber, teal) and 'Rare & Limited' stated on the label.

faqs.question: Do you buy Uncut Unfiltered?
faqs.answer: We generally do not buy recent batches of Uncut Unfiltered as they are widely available. We may buy older batches or store picks.

faqs.question: Is Desert Jewel valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes, Desert Jewel is one of the most sought-after early releases from Smoke Wagon.

faqs.question: Do you buy Smoke Wagon Rye?
faqs.answer: Yes, we purchase the experimental and limited rye releases.

faqs.question: What if the wax is cracked?
faqs.answer: Smoke Wagon wax is thick and can crack. Minor cracks are acceptable, but significant loss may affect the offer.

faqs.question: Where are you located?
faqs.answer: We are based in Los Angeles but buy from collectors nationwide via insured shipping.
